sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card color="basil">
    <v-tabs
      v-model="tab"
      background-color="transparent"
      color="basil"
      grow
    >
      <v-tab v-for="tab in tabs" :key="tab">{{ tab }}</v-tab>
    </v-tabs>

    <v-tabs-items v-model="tab">
      <v-tab-item key="Заявки">
        <MyComponent1 />
      </v-tab-item>
      <v-tab-item key="Счета">
        <MyComponent2 />
      </v-tab-item>
    </v-tabs-items>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
import MyComponent1 from '@/components/MyComponent1.vue';
import MyComponent2 from '@/components/MyComponent2.vue';

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      tab: null,
      tabs: ['Заявки', 'Счета'],
    };
  },
  components: {
    MyComponent1,
    MyComponent2
  }
};
</script>
